string.value: #b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

Icarus is craving Mushroom Bites. Collect the ingredients and take them over to #b#p1052106##k.

#o2220100# #r#a98421##k 
#o1120100# #r#a98422##k 
#t04000009# #b#c04000009#/20#k 
#t04000006# #b#c04000006#/20#k
You helped #b#p1052106##k make delicious Mushroom Bites.

Hey! You have to be careful! Safety is key at a construction site! You have to especially #bbeware of falling#k. What am I talking about? You'll find out when you get to the top of the construction site... In any case, I'm supposed to deliver a message to you.
Maybe it's the weather, but Icarus, who always talks about wanting to fly, has been complaining about not having an appetite. He says he wants some food made of mushroom caps and octopus legs.
There should be many #rBlue Mushrooms#k and #rOctopuses#k near that area. Eliminate about #r50#k of each of them and bring #b20 Blue Mushroom Caps#k and #b20 Octopus Legs#k to #bIcarus#k.
So you're saying you don't want to help?
Defeat #r50 Blue Mushrooms and 50 Octopuses#k and bring #b20 Blue Mushroom Caps and 20 Octopus Legs#k to #bIcarus#k, who has lost his appetite.
Defeat #r50 Blue Mushrooms and 50 Octopuses#k and bring back #b20 Blue Mushroom Caps and 20 Octopus Legs#k.
Defeat #r50 Blue Mushrooms and 50 Octopuses#k and bring back #b20 Blue Mushroom Caps and 20 Octopus Legs#k.
